name: use-confirm
description: Manages user confirmation states for actions.
title: guara hooks

properties.name: The
properties.description: hook returns an object with the current status and control functions

features.title: Status Management
bullets: idle : Initial state, waiting for user action
confirming : User is being asked to confirm the action
confirmed : User has confirmed the action
cancelled : User has cancelled the action

features.title: Returned Values
bullets: The hook returns an object with the current status and control functions

features.title: Best Practices & Caveats
bullets: Use this hook for actions that require user confirmation
Always provide clear UI feedback for each state
Consider using this with modal dialogs or confirmation prompts
